column4: anyone have any experience using serial devices on Ubunutu or Linux in general?
are you trying to connect from or trying to connect to a serial console?
trying to use a GPS device that has a serial cable
StreetPilot III GPS, its Garmin protocol...
did you install any apps to talk to the GPS?
I dont know what ttyS the device is connected to...
sethk: I tried setting gpsd to all those, but wasn't getting anything when i telneted to it...
are you using the grub linux loader?
have you tried to plug in your gps device and while its plugged in and when gpsd is running turn off the gps device and turn it back on
yeah, its saying its opening and closing the pgs but i am not getting any data from the gps device...
have you tried the gps device with a windows box before?
